name: Cybergeddon
description:
Cybergeddon was developed by 3 people during the Global Game Jam 2020. We had to work with the "Repair" theme, so we came up with a game that had it's players fix a computer by beating a vírus! In order to do this, you will have to navigate throughout the computer files to find new weapons and abilities.

Movement - W, A, D;
Jump - Space;

Blink - Shift;

Shield - F;
